derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Middle Low German babbelen, or an independent English formation, as a frequentative based on the repeated syllable ba, typical of a child's early speech

entry.tran: 含糊不清地说；兴奋地说
entry.def: If someone babbles, they talk in a confused or excited way.

example.ex: Momma babbled on and on about how he was ruining me...
example.tran: 妈妈喋喋不休地念叨着他正如何毁掉我。
他们同时叽里咕噜地说了起来。

entry.tran: 嘈杂声；含混不清的说话声
entry.def: You can refer to people's  voices as a babble of sound when they are excited and confused, preventing you from understanding what they are saying.

example.ex: Kemp knocked loudly so as to be heard above the high babble of voices...
example.tran: 肯普大声敲着，好让人们在一片高声喧嚷中听到他的声音。

example.ex: They began to curse and shout in a babble of languages.
example.tran: 他们开始用不同的语言叽里咕噜地谩骂吵嚷起来。

means.word_mean: 1. gibberish resembling the sounds of a baby
1. utter meaningless sounds, like a baby, or utter in an incoherent way;

sentences.sentence: "The old man is only babbling--don't pay attention"
"The two women babbled and crooned at the baby"

means.word_mean: 3. flow in an irregular current with a bubbling noise;

auth_sentence.content: A great deal of unwise babble on this subject.
auth_sentence.res_content: A great deal of unwise babble on this subject.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A great deal of unwise babble on this subject.

auth_sentence.content: They only babble who practise not reflection.
auth_sentence.res_content: They only babble who practise not reflection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They only babble who practise not reflection.

auth_sentence.content: Yelling techno-babble is more fun then doing the research of facts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yelling techno-babble is more fun then doing the research of facts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yelling techno-babble is more fun then doing the research of facts.

sentences.en: The babies babbled as they played.
sentences.cn: 婴孩们一边玩一边咿咿呀呀地学说话。

means.word_mean: 喋喋不休；胡言乱语;说蠢话;唠叨

sentences.cn: 她总是为一点小事唠叨个没完。

sentences.en: She babbled her thanks in a great hurry.
sentences.cn: 她匆忙而含糊地道了谢。

sentences.en: He babbled his apologies in a hurry.
sentences.cn: 他匆忙地用含糊的语调表示道歉。

sentences.en: She babbled a few words to him.
sentences.cn: 她对他说了几句不知所云的话。

sentences.en: He babbled the secret out to his friends.
sentences.cn: 他失口把秘密泄漏给朋友了。

sentences.en: Before we could stop him, he had babbled our plans to the group.
sentences.cn: 我们还没有来得及阻止他, 他已经把我们的计划透露给大伙了。

sentences.en: The babble of voices in the next compartment annoyed all of us.
sentences.cn: 隔壁的车厢隔间里不间歇的嘈杂谈话声让我们都很气恼。

sentences.en: They could hear a loud babble of voices coming from the crowded bar.
sentences.cn: 他们能听到拥挤的酒吧传出来的嘈杂声。
